basics.name: Arjol Pengu
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hi, I'm Arjol Pengu, a Senior Software Engineer with a passion for building scalable, high-performance systems. With extensive experience in Java, Python, and cloud technologies like AWS and Google Cloud Platform, I specialize in developing distributed microservices, backend architectures, and seamless third-party integrations. My expertise spans microservices, API development, cloud-native architectures, and agile software development. I thrive in collaborative environments, working closely with product teams, stakeholders, and engineers to deliver impactful solutions.

work.name: EY
work.summary: Developed and scaled high-volume Java microservices on GCP, integrating third-party services, leading API architecture, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and optimizing platform performance.
responsibilities: Key contributor in developing distributed, high-volume Java microservices using Spring Boot and the Google Cloud Platform, providing a robust and scalable platform enabling all of our client's needs.
Collaborated with other cross-functional teams, product owners, and designers to identify and resolve key technical challenges.
Architected, developed and operated Java services in order to integrate with third-party applications such as Microsoft Dynamics to deliver positive client outcomes.

Worked directly with stakeholders to understand, document, and develop APIs and systems to enable service-to-service integrations, reducing reliance on custom one-off implementations by leveraging RESTful APIs, OData, and Microsoft Dynamics.
Leader and key contributor in deploying and sustaining distributed high-volume services in production.
Responsible for scaling multiple different microservices, such as user identity management services and platform auditing services across the platform.
Collaborated with frontend engineers to develop APIs enabling critical functionality, using GCP Storage, Java, JPA, Liquibase, and Postgres.

Lead in architecting and development of our integration microservice, responsible for communication and data management of third-party services. Developed using Spring Boot, OpenAPI, Hibernate, Liquibase, and Postgres on Google Cloud Platform.
achievements: Secured multiple DOL contracts through consistent results, totalling over 70M in revenue in the span of 3 years.
Successfully designed and deployed a scalable microservice architecture, improving system reliability and reducing downtime across critical services.
Collaborated with stakeholders to design and implement reusable API solutions, reducing custom one-off implementations and increasing development efficiency.
Implemented robust identity management and auditing services, enhancing security and compliance across the platform.

work.name: Nuvalence (acquired by EY)
work.summary: Designed scalable microservices, led auditing architecture, developed APIs, optimized workflows, and enhanced system performance using Java Spring, Camunda, and cloud technologies.
responsibilities: Designed and led the development of a scalable distributed microservice platform to streamline regulatory paperwork processing across multiple domains, leveraging Java Spring Boot, Gradle, PostgreSQL, JPA, and Camunda.
Architected and implemented the entire auditing system, providing agents easy access to system activities, increasing user confidence, and enabling efficient compliance tracking.
Developed and led the orchestration workflow for the license life cycle using Camunda, Java Spring, and OpenAPI, ensuring seamless automation and efficiency.
Designed and built backend APIs for critical functionalities like license issuance, collaborating closely with frontend developers to establish API contracts.
Integrated Google Identity and Firebase for user management and leveraged LibreOffice to generate and issue official documents and licenses.
Engineered robust, extensible application workflows and RESTful APIs using Camunda, Java Spring, Hibernate, and OpenAPI, enhancing scalability and user experience.
Worked with product owners, engineers, and clients to provide expert guidance on system design, implementation, and high-quality code solutions.
Maintained living architecture documents to facilitate collaboration, accelerate onboarding, and provide up-to-date system guidance.
Continuously evaluated and tested system performance and scalability, ensuring optimal functionality across services.
Developed multiple key POCs and prototypes, boosting client confidence and accelerating the company's ability to scale across multiple clients.
Built and maintained a high-performance pricing engine using AWS services (API Gateway, AWS Lambda, ECR) with React.js and Java.
Led infrastructure architecture efforts, managing the full software lifecycle using Jenkins and Terraform.
Conducted discovery sessions and demos for C-level executives, ensuring alignment with client needs and demonstrating agile development progress.
Onboarded client teams, provided technical knowledge transfers, and ensured smooth hand-offs post-engagement.
Offered direct technical guidance and support to clients after project completion to ensure long-term success.
achievements: Led the development of a scalable microservice platform that streamlined regulatory paperwork processing, significantly improving efficiency and reducing manual effort.
Designed and implemented a comprehensive auditing system, increasing transparency and compliance while enhancing agent confidence in system activities.
Developed an automated license lifecycle workflow using Camunda, reducing processing time and ensuring seamless regulatory compliance.
Optimized system performance and scalability, leading to improved response times and a more robust infrastructure.
Successfully built and deployed multiple proof-of-concept prototypes, accelerating client adoption and enabling the company to scale across multiple domains.
Architected a high-performance pricing engine leveraging AWS services, enhancing accuracy and efficiency for client-specific pricing models.
Facilitated seamless third-party integrations using Google Identity, Firebase, and OpenAPI, enhancing system interoperability and user management.
Conducted client demos and stakeholder meetings, securing buy-in and ensuring alignment with business goals.
Provided expert guidance to client teams, leading to smooth knowledge transfers and long-term project success.
Successfully developed and deployed a production level React web app.

work.name: 3M

responsibilities: Led development of a centralized health data platform on AWS, leveraging Python and microservices for Big Data processing.
Utilized distributed technologies like Apache Spark, Hive, Pandas, and AWS Glue to transform large datasets for customer value.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs with API Gateway for seamless integration and user-friendly interfaces for customers and engineers.
Evaluated emerging technologies to enhance platform scalability and meet complex business requirements.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to architect infrastructure and manage the full software lifecycle using AWS CI/CD tools.
Worked closely with stakeholders to understand and implement technical solutions for their business needs.
achievements: Successfully developed and scaled a health data platform capable of handling high-volume Big Data, enhancing both customer and business user experiences.
Streamlined data processing workflows by integrating Apache Spark, AWS Glue, and other technologies, significantly improving operational efficiency and data accuracy.
